page.title: 19DOMESDAY JUNE 1985.
page.content: The 1985 DOMESDAY PROJECT started when CLASS 5-thirty 9-10 year olds-were watching "Zig Zag".The programme told us all about it and we were so interested our teacher,Mrs. Williams,sent for information.When it arrived we chose 20 subjects to find out about.With parents help we VISITED farms and factories,INTERVIEWED and QUESTIONED police,firemen,elderly residents and shoppers and made a SURVEY of village life.In the classroom we PROCESSED piles of completed QUESTIONNAIRES.When we had written a subject in about 140 words we transferred it to the computer.We took four photographs and did a land cover and amenities count.It was hard work but great fun.We found out lots about where we live.
